topics.body:
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539bc936636872691d0d0200#post_539bc936636872691d0d0200
Sugar, air, more sugar, more air, plastic, styrofoam, some obligatory arbitrary vitamins and grains or whatever, and more sugar.

And if you're not eating the kids' stuff, it's mostly bran cardboard-y yet still somehow sugary stuff.

"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539bca2f6368726a154f0200#post_539bca2f6368726a154f0200
Miniaturized cornchips with the obligatory vitamins and stuff, washed in sugary syrupy solution.
A step up from the cardboard, but still more or less the same kind of idea.
